# Extensive Margin Analysis 

## Does tech adoption affect trade outcomes 

$$y_{it} = \alpha_0 + \alpha_1 tech_{it} + FE_{i} + FE_{t} + \varepsilon_{it}$$

## Does existing tech use mitigate COVID impacts?

$$y_{it} = \alpha_0 + \alpha_1 tech_{i}\cdot covid_t + FE_{i} + FE_{t} + \varepsilon_{it}$$

* Are Coefficients $\alpha_2$ and $\alpha_3$ from $\alpha_2 tech_i + \alpha_3 covid_t$ absorbed by $FE_i$ and $FE_t$?
